item.title: Install LAMP in Ubuntu 16.04
item.author: freddy@kresna.xyz (Freddy K Tjoenedi)
item.description: Update and install apache2, MySQL, and PHP sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install apache2 sudo apt-get install mysql-server sudo apt-get install php libapache2-mod-php php-mcrypt php-mysql php-gd php-domphp-mbstring sudo apt-get install landscape-common Setup apache virtual host cd /etc/apache2/sites-available cp 000-default.conf newsite.conf cd ../sites-enabled ln -s ../sites-available/newsite.conf newsite.conf sudo a2ensite newsite.conf sudo systemctl restart apache2 Reference: How To Install Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP (LAMP) stack on Ubuntu 16.04 How To Set Up Apache Virtual Hosts on Ubuntu 16.
